newsitem.title: USA: Kansas feedlot cattle not well established - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Kansas feedlot cattle not well established - USDA.

text.p: Trade was very slow, with a few slaughter steers steady, but not well established, no slaughter heifer sales confirmed, USDA said.
Inquiry moderate, demand fair. Feedlots current. Sales confirmed on 200 slaughter steers Friday.
This week's confirmed sales 101,700 head including 32,600 head or about 32 perecnt percent previously contracted or formulated cattle.
Sales FOB feedlot net weights after 4 percent shrink. Slaughter steers - Few Select and Choice 2-3 1300 lbs 63.00. Confirmed - 200 last week - none last year - none
